repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y dnsutils net-tools iproute2 inetutils-ping curl dnsmasq && \
    apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

ADD dnsmasq.conf /etc/dnsmasq.conf
ADD resolv.conf.dnsmasq /etc/resolv.conf.dnsmasq
